metadata.name: The Crypto Siren
metadata.description:
The crypto siren hypnotizes viewers from inside a pine tree coffin where two bears (representing the bear market) pay homage to cryptocurrency. All this happens during the crypto winter. Even the candles, by their arrangement, symbolize the "red candles" of a falling chart. Finally, there is a doormat on the floor that reads, "We're All Mad Here" (it is an original photograph from the hallway where the artist currently lives). 

The artwork is minted under the artist's collaboration contract, because it was inspired by the nft-photo "maybe a nymph", which is used with kind permission of the original artist. Minted for the exhibition "Ã‡a sent le sapin" at NFT Factory in Paris, December of 2022.
